_comment: JLab CEBAF-style Hierarchical Database - Demonstrates semantic tree navigation with friendly names throughout. Uses _channel_part to map friendly names to technical PV strings. All hierarchy levels provide semantic navigation; only the 'pv' level appears in the channel name.

hierarchy._description: Navigation uses friendly names at all levels. The '_channel_part' field maps friendly names to technical PV strings. Example navigation: Magnets → Skew Quadrupoles → North Linac → MQS1L02 → Current Setpoint. Channel name: MQS1L02.S

Magnets._description: Magnets. Power-supplied magnetic elements used to guide and focus the beam.

Skew Quadrupoles._description: Skew quadrupole family. Includes ST, SK, QS families for coupled-plane correction.

North Linac._description: North Linac (First pass). Overall area: North Linac region. PV names contain '1L'.

MQS1L02._description: Skew Quad in North Linac Girder 02. Provides coupled-plane beam correction.

Current Setpoint._description: Requested magnet excitation current for coupled correction (read-write).

Integrated Field._description: ∫B·dl along the beam path. Measure of integrated focusing strength (read-only).

Magnet Current._description: Measured excitation current from DCCT sensor (read-only).

Magnet Voltage._description: Measured supply voltage across magnet coil (read-only).

MQS1L03._description: Skew Quad in North Linac Girder 03.

East Arc._description: East Arc (First pass). Recirculation arc region connecting linac passes. PV names contain '1A'.

MQSEP1A._description: Skew Quad Septum in East Arc sector 1A. Injection region correction magnet.

Main Quadrupoles._description: Main quadrupole focusing magnets. Primary beam focusing elements in both horizontal and vertical planes.

MQA1L02._description: Main Quad in North Linac Girder 02. Primary focusing element.

Diagnostics._description: Beam diagnostic instruments. Position monitors, profile monitors, and beam loss detectors.

Beam Position Monitors._description: Beam Position Monitors. Measure transverse (X,Y) beam position with micron precision.

Horizontal Position._description: Beam X position in mm relative to electrical center (read-only).

Vertical Position._description: Beam Y position in mm relative to electrical center (read-only).

Horizontal RMS._description: RMS beam size in horizontal plane in mm (read-only).

Vertical RMS._description: RMS beam size in vertical plane in mm (read-only).

Vacuum._description: Vacuum system. Ion pumps, gauges, and valves maintaining ultra-high vacuum.

Ion Pumps._description: Ion pumps providing distributed pumping throughout accelerator.

VIP1L02._description: Ion Pump in North Linac Girder 02.

Pump Voltage._description: Ion pump high voltage in kV. Indicates pump health (read-only).

Pump Current._description: Ion pump current in μA. Proportional to vacuum pressure (read-only).

Pressure Gauges._description: Vacuum pressure gauges monitoring chamber pressure.

VGC1L02._description: Vacuum Gauge Controller in North Linac Girder 02.

Pressure Reading._description: Chamber pressure in Torr. Typically 1e-9 to 1e-10 (read-only).
